msg: LUCENE-5149: CommonTermsQuery should allow minNrShouldMatch for high & low freq terms

msg: LUCENE-5151: Associations aggregators enter an infinite loop if some documents have no category associations

author: ceposta
msg: added tests for APLO-325 for broker-side config of max_text_message_size

author: rjollos
msg: Fix for components with unicode characters preventing rendering of the milestone view. Fixes #616.

The milestone view shows a list of components, and the milestone view would not render due to an improperly encoded href string. URL encoding of the query href parameters did not account for the possibility that the parameters could be unicode strings.
